|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = |rad2ac = 1300 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "48SAM201.SGF" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :OEM: [[Wistron NeWeb]] Linksys WRT1900AC v2 - ''Cobra'' *[http://www.linksys.com/ru/support-article?articleNum=156194 Product comparison between ''Linksys WRT1900AC and WRT1900AC v2''] :CPU: [[Marvell]] MV88F6820-A0 C160 @1.33/1.6GHz ([https://fccid.io/Q87-WRT1900ACV2/Internal-Photos/Internal-Photos-2561219 FCC images]) {{FCC ST|06/30/2015}} ==Links of Interest== ===Wikis=== *{{WPLink|Linksys_routers#WRT1900AC}} *[https://github.com/Chadster766/McDebian/wiki ''Linksys WRT1900AC'' on the '''McDebian''' Wiki] *[https://openwrt.org/toh/linksys/wrt_ac_series On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] :[https://openwrt.org/toh/linksys/wrt_ac_series#wrt1900ac WRT1900AC v2] - [[Marvell]] Armada 385 @1.3GHz (Cobra) ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32856-linksys-wrt1900acs-dual-band-gigabit-router-reviewed ''Linksys WRT1900ACS Dual-Band Gigabit Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32393-linksys-wrt1900ac-ac1900-dual-band-wireless-router-review Review ''Linksys WRT1900AC v1'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ([http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32400-linksys-wrt1900ac-review-more-tests + more tests]) *[http://www.linksys.com/ca/support-article?articleNum=143610 ''Getting to know the Linksys WRT1900AC'' on '''Lynksys'''] :[[Linksys WRT1900AC v1]] is powered by a Dual Core @1.2GHz CPU :Linksys WRT1900AC v2 is powered by a Dual-Core @1.3GHz CPU ::CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6820; 88F6820-A0 C133 @1.33GHz :Uses a 12V/3A power adapter ===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=50173&p=322 ''Update on Linksys WRT1900AC support'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] (Kaloz) :Support for the WRT1900ACS (Shelby) is available in CC and trunk *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/linksys-wrt-1900acs.27516/ ''Linksys WRT1900ACS'' on '''SNB''' forums] (RMerlin) *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=256298&start=1035 ''Linksys WRT1900AC/Marvell support'' on '''DD-WRT''' forums] :CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6820 C160 @1.6GHz, RAM @800MHz 
WRT1900AC v1:

Board: RD-AXP-GP rev 1.0 
SoC:   MV78230 B0 
       running 2 CPUs 
       Custom configuration 
CPU:   Marvell PJ4B (584) v7 (Rev 2) LE 
       CPU 0 
       CPU    @ 1200 [MHz] 
       L2     @ 600 [MHz] 
       TClock @ 250 [MHz] 
       DDR    @ 600 [MHz] 
       DDR 32Bit Width, FastPath Memory Access 
       DDR ECC Disabled 
DRAM:  256 MiB 

WRT1900AC V2:

Board: RD-NAS-88F6820-DDR3 
SoC:   MV88F6820 Rev A0 
       running 2 CPUs 
CPU:   ARM Cortex A9 MPCore (Rev 1) LE 
       CPU 0 
       CPU    @ 1600 [MHz] 
       L2     @ 800 [MHz] 
       TClock @ 200 [MHz] 
       DDR    @ 800 [MHz] 
       DDR 32 Bit Width, FastPath Memory Access, 
            DLB Enabled, ECC Disabled 
DRAM:  512 MiB
See also [[Talk:Linksys WRT1900AC v2]].. ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = wrt1900acv2 build 27700 20150820 :[https://forum.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Linksys_WRT1900AC Install Guide] Please insert instructions here ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/linksys/linksys_wrt1900ac_v2 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/linksys/wrt1900ac |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = mvebu |subtarget = cortexa9 |arch = arm_cortex-a9_vfpv3 |support_started_version = 15.05 |current_supported_version = 23.05.4 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==See also== [[List of Four Stream Hardware]] *[[Linksys WRT32X]] *[[Linksys WRT3200ACM]] *[[Linksys WRT1900AC v1]] *Linksys WRT1900AC v2 *[[Linksys WRT1900ACS]] *[[Linksys WRT1200AC v1]] *[[Linksys WRT1200AC v2]] [[Category:English Documentation]]
